org.joone.util
Class OutputConverterPlugIn

java.lang.Object
  org.joone.util.OutputConverterPlugIn
All Implemented Interfaces:
OutputPluginListener, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
UnNormalizerOutputPlugIn
public abstract class OutputConverterPlugIn
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, OutputPluginListener

This is the abstract class that must be extended to implement plugins for output data preprocessing. The objects extending this class can be inserted into objects that extend the org.joone.io.StreamOutputSynapse.

See Also:

setAdvancedSerieSelector

public void setAdvancedSerieSelector(java.lang.String newAdvSerie)
Sets specification of the Advanced Serie Selector. The format of the selector is e.g "1,2,3,5" , this will select serie 1 and 2 and 3 and 5 for conversion. Note a range can also be used e.g "2,3,4-6,8" , this will select serie 2 and 3 and 4 and 5 and 6 and 8.

Parameters:
newAdvSerie - String The new advanced serie selector to use.

check

public java.util.TreeSet check(java.util.TreeSet checks)
Returns any problems or errors concerning the setup of this OutputPlugIn in a TreeSet. The problems or errors will stop the plugin from operating normally.

Parameters:
checks - The TreeSet of errors/problems passed down from the parent class.
Returns:
The TreeSet containing the problems or errors.
